question: Which symbol will be on the face opposite to the face with symbol * ?
answer_description: The symbols of the adjacent faces to the face with symbol * are @, -, + and $. Hence the required symbol is 8.

question: Two positions of dice are shown below. How many points will appear on the opposite to the face containing 5 points?
answer_description: In these two positions one of the common face having 1 point is in the same position. Therefore according to rule (2). There will be 4 points on the required face.

question: Which digit will appear on the face opposite to the face with number 4?
answer_description: Here the common faces with number 3, are in same positions. Hence 6 is opposite to 2 and 5 is opposite to 1. Therefore 4 is opposite to 3.

question: Two positions of a dice are shown below. Which number will appear on the face opposite to the face with the number 5?
answer_description: According to the rule no. (3), common faces with number 3, are in same positions. Hence the number of the opposite face to face with number 5 will be 6.

question: How many points will be on the face opposite to in face which contains 2 points?
answer_description: In first two positions of dice one common face containing 5 is same. Therefore according to rule no. (3) the face opposite to the face which contains 2 point, will contains 6 points.
